publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3174 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Scottish Regimental Cap Badgesâ€”That the Parliament calls on the Ministry of Defence to retain the current individual regimental cap badges of the Scottish regiments, as is the case with the Guards, in order to retain the link with regimental associations and communities throughout Scotland, thereby enhancing recruitment. R Supported by: Christine Grahame*, John Scott*, Alex Neil*, Alex Fergusson*, Mike Rumbles*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Derek Brownlee*, Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*, Murdo Fraser*, Phil Gallie*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Alex Johnstone* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3174 Scottish Regimental Cap Badges (lodged on 22 August 2005) Mary Scanlon*
S2M-3174 Scottish Regimental Cap Badges (lodged on 22 August 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3174 Scottish Regimental Cap Badges (lodged on 22 August 2005) Mr Jamie Stone*
